mapper.select: SELECT BASE_CODE_IDX,GROUP_CODE ,GUBN,BASE_CODE,BASE_NAME,BASE_VALUE,BASE_SUMMARY,BASE_STATUS,BASE_SORT,ui.USERNAME as REGISTER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(bc.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as REG_DATE ,BASE_OPTION FROM base_code bc INNER JOIN USERINFO ui ON bc.REG_DW_USER_IDX = ui.USERIDX ORDER BY BASE_CODE_IDX ASC

select BASE_CODE_IDX,GROUP_CODE ,GUBN,BASE_CODE,BASE_NAME,BASE_VALUE,BASE_SUMMARY,BASE_STATUS,BASE_SORT,u.USERNAME as REGISTER_NAME ,b.REG_DATE ,BASE_OPTION FROM BASE_CODE b LEFT OUTER JOIN USERINFO u ON b.BASE_CODE_IDX = u.USERIDX where BASE_CODE_IDX = #{idx}
SELECT BASE_CODE, BASE_NAME FROM BASE_CODE bc WHERE GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE AND BASE_OPTION = 'SYSTEM' AND BASE_STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY BASE_SORT
SELECT GROUP_CODE, BASE_NAME FROM BASE_CODE bc WHERE GROUP_CODE = BASE_CODE AND BASE_STATUS ='Y'

SELECT BASE_CODE_IDX,GROUP_CODE ,GUBN,BASE_CODE,BASE_NAME,BASE_VALUE,BASE_SUMMARY,BASE_STATUS,BASE_SORT,ui.USERNAME as REGISTER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(bc.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as REG_DATE ,BASE_OPTION FROM base_code bc INNER JOIN USERINFO ui ON bc.REG_DW_USER_IDX = ui.USERIDX WHERE 1=1
and GUBN = #{sGubun}
and GROUP_CODE like '%' || #{sTextval} || '%'
and BASE_CODE like '%' || #{sTextval} || '%'
select * from SYS_BASE_CODE where CODENAME LIKE '%' || #{CODENAME} ||'%'
select * from SYS_BASE_CODE where CODEGROUP LIKE '%' || #{CODEGROUP} ||'%'
